scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development yarn build && PORT=3001 yarn start
scripts.inspect: NODE_ENV=development yarn build && PORT=3001 NODE_ENV=production node --inspect build/index.js
scripts.forever: NODE_ENV=production yarn build && sudo nohup forever start forever-config.json &
scripts.release: NODE_ENV=production tsc && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project evident-ethos-317302
scripts.release-europe1: NODE_ENV=production tsc && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project rune-evolution-europe1
scripts.release-na1: NODE_ENV=production tsc && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project rune-evolution-useast1
scripts.release-asia1: NODE_ENV=production tsc && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project rune-evolution-asia1
scripts.release-sa1: NODE_ENV=production tsc && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project rune-evolution-sa1
scripts.release-ptr: NODE_ENV=staging tsc && gcloud app deploy app.ptr.yaml --project rune-evolution-ptr
scripts.update: git checkout europe1 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout europe2 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout europe3 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout asia1 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout asia2 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout asia3 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout asia4 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout na1 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout sa1 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout oceanic1 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout sa1 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout sa2 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout sa3 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout sa4 && git merge ptr1 && git push && git checkout sa5 && git merge ptr1
scripts.update2: sudo pkill -f node && cd /opt/bitnami/projects/rune-evolution-game-server/ && git checkout HEAD -- public/data/rewards.json && git pull && yarn build
